block_public_access.description: A state of block public access. If false, block public access is not enabled.

bucket_name.description: The name of the s3 bucket

sse_algorithm.description: The server-side encryption algorithm to use. Valid values are AES256 and aws:kms. If you specify aws:kms, a new KMS key will be provisioned and used. If empty, no encryption is performed.

enable_website_configuration.description: Enable website configuration for the bucket

website_index_document.description: The index document for the bucket

website_error_document.description: The error document for the bucket

bucket_policy.description: The IAM policy of the bucket (can be used to allow access to other roles or accounts)

tags.description: A mapping of AWS tags to assign to the bucket.
